Title: The World
Writer: Benjamin Bocquelet (creator), Benjamin Bocquelet, Jon Brittain, Tom Crowley, Jon Foster, James Lamont
Actors: Logan Grove, Kwesi Boakye, Kyla Rae Kowalewski, Teresa Gallagher
Plot: The amazing world of Elmore is full of inanimate objects that aren't nearly as inanimate as you might hope.
